name: Treat Fight
description:
Weeklygamjam108

This game is based on Weekly game jam theme. Player have to get to the Little cake princess, which is locked inside a door. You need to find the key and also Destroy the Obstacles to get yourself to the destiny.

Hope You Like It.

MAKE SURE TO CHECK ABOUT SETTING IN THE MAIN MENU OF THE TO CONTACT ME AND READ THE INSTRUCTION.

Controls :

A , B : Move Left and Right

S : Jump

Fire1 or Left Mouse button : Shoot Bullets

Also there are some Bugs , I uploaded it because of lack of time. So sorry for That ......

And Enjoy the game....

THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!
